ygData.subject: Re: Source for Combine Weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: And the plentiful Dragoon Dirk, available by a decent group of 18-22 or for 20-40 pp, is better than MANY of the Well-Balanced Weapons as well! Guess Well
ygData.messageBody:
And the plentiful Dragoon Dirk, available by a decent group of 18-22 or for
20-40 pp, is better than MANY of the Well-Balanced Weapons as well!

Guess "Well Balanced" aren't so "well balanced" after all! (Smile)

Tallonn - Bertox

-----Original Message-----
From: Codo the Mysterious <codo@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, July 01, 1999 7:54 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Source for Combine Weapons


>From: "Codo the Mysterious" <codo@...>
>
>Yes, it's called Dvinn. His Dragoon Dirk is better than any Combine weapon
>except a Two Handed Sword. You can also sometimes find the dirks for sale.
>My friend bought one for 40plat last night...
>
>Lulen
>
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Bob Stewart <bstewart@...>
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>

>Subject: [eqbards] Source for Combine Weapons
